name: EmeraldCanopyRoot
description: The leading end-to-end reforestation company in the USA, on a mission to make reforestation scalable. We are the only vertically-integrated reforestation company in the industry and are the largest seed bank and reforestation container stock producer in the Western USA. We are also an innovation center for the non-timber forestry supply chain, developing various biological and technical products for achieving land management goals more efficiently
